import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import {Product, products} from '../products' export interface category{ name: string; } export const categories = [ { name : 'Phones' }, { name : 'PC' } ] @Component({ selector: 'app-category', templateUrl: './category.component.html', styleUrls: ['./category.component.css'] }) export class CategoryComponent { producrList : Product[] = [] constructor(private route: ActivatedRoute){ } categories = [...categories] ngOnInit() { // First get the product id from the current route. const routeParams = this.route.snapshot.paramMap; const categoryFromRoute = String(routeParams.get('category')); return categoryFromRoute; } categoryy(){ window.alert(this.ngOnInit()) // for (let i =0; i
